post.description: Callback received in case of status change in a topup payment

parameters.name: callback01Url
parameters.description: the location where data will be sent.  Must be network accessible by the source server

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: the transaction id

parameters.name: error
parameters.description:
the error codes for failed payments :  
0 = 0XXX operation succeeded or still processing  
10 = 1XXX operation rejected because of bad request configuration  
11 = 2XXX operation rejected because of bad reference usage  
12 = 3XXX operation rejected because of bad account configuration  
13 = 4XXX operation rejected because of the bank or the supplier  
14 = 5XXX operation rejected because of a system error  
15 = 6XXX operation rejected because of anti-fraud engine

parameters.name: status
parameters.description:
the transaction status :  
-1 = unknow  
0 = waiting  
1 = completed  
2 = refunded  
3 = refused  
4 = waiting for validation  
5 = cancelled  
6 = waiting to be sent

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: the callback type

parameters.name: initialOrderID
parameters.description: initial transaction orderid

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: the transaction amount

202.description:
Your server implementation should return this HTTP status code
if the data was received successfully

204.description:
Your server should return this HTTP status code if no longer interested
in further updates

post.description: Callback received when a card authorisation is created following its processing in Xpollens and each time its status change

appCardId.description: the reference or alias of the card

transactionAmount.description: the amount in local currency in decimal

currencyCodeTransaction.description: the transaction currency code (ISO 4217 numeric code)

cardHolderBillingAmount.description: the amount in euro (used for foreign currency transactions) in decimal format

cardHolderBillingConversionRate.description: the exchange rate (used for foreign currency transactions) in decimal value in string data type

availableBalance.description: the balance after authorisation (or after a change in status = cancellation, expiry) in decimal format

actionCode.description:
the response code (authorization and reasons for refusal) :  
0 = approved  
100 = denied, invalid card status  
114 = denied, authorisation server does not respond  
116 = denied, insufficient funds or limits reached  
119 = denied, transaction not permitted to cardholder  
198 = denied, technical error  
other = denied, Natixis refused the transaction

merchantType.description: the merchant type (Merchant Category Code) is a four-digit number listed in ISO 18245 for retail financial services. An MCC is used to classify a business by the types of goods or services it provides

status.description:
the Operation status :  
0 = waiting  
3 = failed  
5 = cancelled  
7 = expired

ert.description:
the regulatory and technical environment  
10 = proximity (face-to-face payment)  
2x = online payment  
4x = unattended vending machine  
6x = quasi-cash  
7x = withdrawal (ATM or bank agency)

cardDataInputMode.description:
the input mode for the payment :  
0 = unspecified  
5 = contact  
9 = contactless  
Other = manual (no terminal), magnetic stripe,…

tokenRequestorID.description:
the id of the token requestor :  
40010030273 = Apple Pay  
40010043095 = Samsung Pay  
40010069887 = Garmin Pay  
40010051602 = Amazon(COF)  
40010075001 = Google Pay  
40010075839 = Netflix (COF)  
40010075338  = Visa Checkout - VCO

terminalCountryCode.description: the Country where the payment took place

executedDate.description: the executed date of the operation. Warning: unusual date format: (dd/MM/yyyy hh:mm:ss)

post.description: Callback received in case of status change in a card operation

reference.description: the reference or alias of the card

cardType.description:
the type of the ordered card :  
1 = classic virtual  
2 = classic physical  
3 = premium virtual  
4 = premium physical

action.description:
the action done on the card :  
0 = creation  
1 = cancellation  
2 = refabrication  
3 = renewal  
4 = update

status.description:
the Status of the card :  
0 = ordered  
1 = sent  
2 = activated  
3 = expired  
4 = opposed  
5 = failed  
6 = deactivated  
7 = cancelled

opposedReason.description:
the reason for card opposition :  
This field is different than '0' only when the card is opposed.  
07 = special conditions  
34 = suspected fraud  
41 = lost  
43 = stolen)

status.description:

- validated  
- refused  
- to_review_manually

diligenceType.description:
the type of diligence :  
- SCT_In  
- InstantPayment_In

reason.description: the reason of acceptance or rejection of the diligence
reason.example: The beneficiary's name is different from the transmitter's name

amount.description: the amount of the money in transfer  (in cents of euro)

transferDate.description: the date of the money in transfer

transmitterFullName.description: the firstname and lastname (and birthname if existing) of the transmitter

operationType.description:
the type of operation :  
- SCT_In  
- InstantPayment_In

name.description: the result of the identity matching algorithm (percentage)

firstName.description: the result of the identity matching algorithm (percentage)

parameters.name: callback36Url
parameters.description:
the location where data will be sent.  Must be network accessible

parameters.name: authenticationId
parameters.description: the id of the authentication operation (used to link to the synchronous response)

parameters.description: the callback type

parameters.name: appUserId
parameters.description: the user unique identifier

parameters.name: authenticationResultDate
parameters.description: the effective authentication result date

parameters.name: requestProcessDate
parameters.description: the effective end date for the operation

parameters.name: requestResponseCode
parameters.description: the Http status code of the operation

parameters.name: requestDate
parameters.description: the effective date for the operation

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: the status of the authentication

parameters.name: reason
parameters.description:
the reason of failure if applicable :  
- TIMEOUT: customer did not authenticate in due time  
- CANCELED: customer CANCELED the authentication request  
- FAILED: customer did not successfully authenticate

- failed

listedInStockMarkets.description: Is the legal entity listed in stock markets

regulated.description: Is the legal entity regulated under special circumstances

address.description: adress details of the legal entity

post.description: Callback received in case of a freeze status change for a user

parameters.name: callback15Url
parameters.description: the location where data will be sent.  Must be network accessible by the source server

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: the callback type

parameters.name: userstatus
parameters.description:
the user new status :  
1 = OK (not frozen)  
2 = frozen

parameters.name: userid
parameters.description: the appuserid

202.description:
Your server implementation should return this HTTP status code
if the data was received successfully

204.description:
Your server should return this HTTP status code if no longer interested
in further updates
